document_data.name: House of the Triad
document_data.architecture: Made of stone in the [[dwarven]] style
document_data.mainbody: The '''House of the Triad''' was a temple dedicated to the deities of [[the Triad]] in the walled town of [[Bryn Shander]]. The stone structure was the largest holy place within the most prominent settlement of the [[Ten Towns]].
document_data.Staff: The House was attended to by clergy members that visited from the far-off cities of [[Neverwinter]] and [[Waterdeep]].
document_data.History: The stone building that became the House of the Triad was originally built by the [[dwarves]] of [[Kelvin's Cairn]].
